channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 7th September
item.description:

item.title: Lots of leaves and on the road and on the pavement and it's creasing daily because of the number of trees on the pavement as well the property next door on Cumberland Rd which has overhanging trees and leaves and all of them blow into my garden, 7th September
item.description:
It's been like this all summer nothing has been cleaned properly and I pay council tax and I expect this to be done routinely without me having to inform you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Durham Avenue, Shortlands, London

item.title: Flytipping in foot tunnel, 7th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nightingale Place, London

item.title: Barriers, 7th September
item.description:
Northumberland place vehicle access blocked. Residents, tradesmen and visitors have right of access which should not involve getting out of cars to move heavy metal fence which is not easy for some. Barriers often left in road unilluminated at night causing hazard see photo. Please Westminster ensure this street scheme is correctly stewarded according to the mandate. At present restrictions are greater than they should be preventing householders going about their daily lives.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Northumberland Place, Bayswater, London
Report on FixMyStreet
